description:
Lena is a Pokémon Trainer traveling in the Kalos region. Bonnie randomly walked up to Lena at a Pokémon Center near Shoyo City and asked her to marry her brother Clemont.
While talking to an acquaintance, her younger sister Lyn went looking for Pichu who was in a pochette that got mixed up with Bonnie`s pochette at the Pokémon Center. Lyn feared her sister Lena would be mad.
Lena went searching for Lyn and her Pichu after she realized she wasn`t with her anymore. They were reunited with the help of Clemont and his friends who were also looking for Lyn and Lena. Both the Pokémon were returned to their owners. She then had a meal with Ash and his friends.
name: Lenna
